item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 3)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 2)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 2)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 1)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Historian (Level 6)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Author (Level 8)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 8)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.
